comment: Prof. Kanter is very kind, but is so scatterbrained with her lectures & course materials that it can severely mess with the understanding of the content. She consistently messes up basic concepts, shows wrong PowerPoints, and has even asked my class on a few occasions to Google something she was teaching - in the MIDDLE of her teaching it.

honestly the worst professor ive ever had. she doesnt care about your feelings and is beyond confusing while teaching. attendance isnt mandatory but i went to almost every class and still learned nothing considering the drastic change in her teaching style and what seems to be every other math teacher. if you can dont take this class!!

Professor Kanter is a very nice lady, but the class is hard to keep up with. A lot of the lectures different from the aleks homework in some way, which leads you to have to teach yourself. Also all tests are on lockdown browser with a camera.

Dr. Kanter is a great person. She is very nice. However, she is not at all helpful. Her teaching style is very confusing, so much so that going to class regresses my understanding of the topics. I basically taught myself.

Boring lectures that are so confusing. You walk out of class more confused then when you came in. Outside of class there is just homework on ALEKS, the lectures she post aren't helpful because she posts definitions and its a math class. if you struggle in math, DO NOT TAKE!!!
